siteMetadata.description: 为用户提供简单的云原生应用，帮助软件开发商构建基于全球云计算的在线商业体系

nodes.title: 数字经济专业委员会在长沙成立，Websoft9 助力传统企业转型
The professional Service for Elmo B2B Marketech in China

description.description:
Elmo website is based on Wordpress:

- No IT support team in China
- Chinese website need to synchronize with Global
- Local SEO
- Intergate with Salesforce

content.content: The cooperation between Elmo and Websoft9 began with the recommendation of Alibaba Cloud. At the beginning, Elmo's business in China was growing rapidly and needed a localized website for content marketing and technical support.

childMarkdownRemark.html: The cooperation between Elmo and Websoft9 began with the recommendation of Alibaba Cloud. At the beginning, Elmo's business in China was growing rapidly and needed a localized website for content marketing and technical support.

persons.title: Marketing Manager
reviews: Without a professional IT team in Elmo China, the efficient operation of the content marketing business system of the marketing department is inseparable from the services of Websoft9
